data.name: Chill Town
data.detailed_description:
A sequel of Chill Corner - a combination of relaxing simulation and idle game.

Features:

  • Beautiful rooms and outdoor environment with chilling atmosphere and weather
  • Many lo-fi, acoustic and other genre of music for chilling, relaxing or focusing
  • Creative game mode provide ability to play as simulation game
  • Many ingame activities: fishing, cooking, camping, hunting for insects...
  • Building your house and growing your farm.
  • Decorating your house interior.
  • Idle mode offers a lot of beautiful scenes with a relaxing atmosphere that you can use as wallpaper or just keep running in the background while doing your real life activity.
  • Customizing your character.
  • Tame and care for your pet.
  • Creating and manage your task
  • Creating and customize your favorite music playlist

data.short_description: A sequel of Chill Corner - a combination of relaxing simulation and idle game. Listening to beautiful music while decorating the room, fishing, cooking or even keeping it in background while doing your real life activities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
